name: Unity Workshop: Skyisland
description:
A workshop on the basics of Unity from the editor itself to making some simple scripts. All assets are included. The 3D models were made by Sven Kuhne and are free to use so long as you credit GDAC.

World Skies free is made by PulsarBytes who have kindly allowed us to upload our game with the assets to itch.io. You can check out their page here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/worldskies-free-86517

This project also includes the Unity Standard Assets.
developers: Game Development Club at UC Davis
